title: Can Karthus and i guess Sion only lose 8 stacks when they die?
body:
Their passives are only useful when they die which is counter intuitive to stacking. So they more or less have to fight with only 4 of their 5 "skills" in order to keep the stack count increasing, so losing only 8/10 (4/5) of the stacks would be fair in my opinion. Also since these passives do not somehow revive them, they always lose stacks (unlike say Zac, Zilean, or Anivia).

_Edit: If it was not clear, I am talking about {{item:3041}} ._

replies.body:
I'd assume Mejai's.
Making an item work differently for 2 out of over 100 champs seems a little silly though.  How often would you even grab Mejai's on them?

sion idk, but karthus I would since his ult makes stacking a bit easier (like soraka) but since he gets destroyed in most 1v1s or team fights because he is built around dieing being a part of his kit, it isn't a good item for him to grab usually.
